verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> happened מִקֵּ֖ץ <S%H7093><s%> And it came to pass at the end שְׁנָתַ֣יִם <S%H8141><s%> years יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> of two full וּפַרְעֹ֣ה <S%H6547><s%> that Pharaoh חֹלֵ֔ם <S%H2492><s%> dreamed וְהִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold עֹמֵ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> and behold he stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הַיְאֹֽר׃ <S%H2975><s%> by the river

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and lo מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיְאֹ֗ר <S%H2975><s%> out of the river עֹלֹת֙ <S%H5927><s%> And behold there came up שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פָּר֔וֹת <S%H6510><s%> kine יְפ֥וֹת <S%H3303><s%> well מַרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> favoured וּבְרִיאֹ֣ת <S%H1277><s%> and fat בָּשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> and they וַתִּרְעֶ֖ינָה <S%H7462><s%> and they fed בָּאָֽחוּ׃ <S%H260><s%> in a meadow

וְהִנֵּ֞ה <S%H2009><s%> behold שֶׁ֧בַע <S%H7651><s%> And behold seven פָּר֣וֹת <S%H6510><s%> kine אֲחֵר֗וֹת <S%H312><s%> other עֹל֤וֹת <S%H5927><s%> came up אַחֲרֵיהֶן֙ <S%H310><s%> after them מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיְאֹ֔ר <S%H2975><s%> out of the river רָע֥וֹת <S%H7451><s%> ill מַרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> favoured וְדַקּ֣וֹת <S%H1851><s%> dwarf בָּשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> and they וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֛דְנָה <S%H5975><s%> and stood אֵ֥צֶל <S%H681><s%> by הַפָּר֖וֹת <S%H6510><s%> the [other] kine עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> upon the brink הַיְאֹֽר׃ <S%H2975><s%> of the river

וַתֹּאכַ֣לְנָה <S%H398><s%> did eat up הַפָּר֗וֹת <S%H6510><s%> kine רָע֤וֹת <S%H7451><s%> And the ill הַמַּרְאֶה֙ <S%H4758><s%> favoured וְדַקֹּ֣ת <S%H1851><s%> dwarf הַבָּשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> body אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> the seven הַפָּר֔וֹת <S%H6510><s%> kine יְפֹ֥ת <S%H3303><s%> well הַמַּרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> favoured וְהַבְּרִיאֹ֑ת <S%H1277><s%> and fat וַיִּיקַ֖ץ <S%H3364><s%> awoke פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> So Pharaoh

וַיִּישָׁ֕ן <S%H3462><s%> And he slept וַֽיַּחֲלֹ֖ם <S%H2492><s%> and dreamed שֵׁנִ֑ית <S%H8145><s%> the second time וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> and behold שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> and behold seven שִׁבֳּלִ֗ים <S%H7641><s%> ears of corn עֹל֛וֹת <S%H5927><s%> came up בְּקָנֶ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> stalk אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> upon one בְּרִיא֥וֹת <S%H1277><s%> rank וְטֹבֽוֹת׃ <S%H2896><s%> and good

וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> behold שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> And behold seven שִׁבֳּלִ֔ים <S%H7641><s%> ears דַּקּ֖וֹת <S%H1851><s%> thin וּשְׁדוּפֹ֣ת <S%H7710><s%> and blasted קָדִ֑ים <S%H6921><s%> with the east wind צֹמְח֖וֹת <S%H6779><s%> sprung up אַחֲרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H310><s%> after them

וַתִּבְלַ֙עְנָה֙ <S%H1104><s%> devoured הַשִּׁבֳּלִ֣ים <S%H7641><s%> ears הַדַּקּ֔וֹת <S%H1851><s%> And the seven thin אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> the seven הַֽשִּׁבֳּלִ֔ים <S%H7641><s%> ears הַבְּרִיא֖וֹת <S%H1277><s%> rank וְהַמְּלֵא֑וֹת <S%H4392><s%> and full וַיִּיקַ֥ץ <S%H3364><s%> awoke פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold חֲלֽוֹם׃ <S%H2472><s%> and behold [it was] a dream

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> And it came to pass in the morning וַתִּפָּ֣עֶם <S%H6470><s%> was troubled רוּח֔וֹ <S%H7307><s%> that his spirit וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> and he sent וַיִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all חַרְטֻמֵּ֥י <S%H2748><s%> for all the magicians מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חֲכָמֶ֑יהָ <S%H2450><s%> and all the wise men וַיְסַפֵּ֨ר <S%H5608><s%> told פַּרְעֹ֤ה <S%H6547><s%> thereof and Pharaoh לָהֶם֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲלֹמ֔וֹ <S%H2472><s%> them his dream וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there פּוֹתֵ֥ר <S%H6622><s%> but [there was] none that could interpret אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לְפַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> them unto Pharaoh

וַיְדַבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> Then spake שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֔ים <S%H4945><s%> cupbearer אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲטָאַ֕י <S%H2399><s%> my faults אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I מַזְכִּ֥יר <S%H2142><s%> I do remember הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> this day

פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh קָצַ֣ף <S%H7107><s%> was wroth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with עֲבָדָ֑יו <S%H5650><s%> with his servants וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> and put אֹתִ֜י <S%H853><s%> בְּמִשְׁמַ֗ר <S%H4929><s%> me in ward בֵּ֚ית <S%H1004><s%> house שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> in the captain הַטַּבָּחִ֔ים <S%H2876><s%> of the guard's אֹתִ֕י <S%H853><s%> וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שַׂ֥ר <S%H8269><s%> [both] me and the chief הָאֹפִֽים׃ <S%H644><s%> baker

וַנַּֽחַלְמָ֥ה <S%H2492><s%> And we dreamed חֲל֛וֹם <S%H2472><s%> a dream בְּלַ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> night אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> in one אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I וָה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> and I אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> each man כְּפִתְר֥וֹן <S%H6623><s%> according to the interpretation חֲלֹמ֖וֹ <S%H2472><s%> of his dream חָלָֽמְנוּ׃ <S%H2492><s%> I and he we dreamed

וְשָׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> there אִתָּ֜נוּ <S%H854><s%> for נַ֣עַר <S%H5288><s%> And [there was] there with us a young man עִבְרִ֗י <S%H5680><s%> an Hebrew עֶ֚בֶד <S%H5650><s%> servant לְשַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> to the captain הַטַּבָּחִ֔ים <S%H2876><s%> of the guard וַנְּ֨סַפֶּר־ <S%H5608><s%> and we told ל֔וֹ וַיִּפְתָּר־ <S%H6622><s%> him and he interpreted לָ֖נוּ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲלֹמֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H2472><s%> to us our dreams אִ֥ישׁ <S%H582><s%> according כַּחֲלֹמ֖וֹ <S%H2472><s%> according to his dream פָּתָֽר׃ <S%H6622><s%> he did interpret

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> happened כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he פָּֽתַר־ <S%H6622><s%> And it came to pass as he interpreted לָ֖נוּ כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so הָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> happened אֹתִ֛י <S%H853><s%> הֵשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> to us so it was me he restored עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in כַּנִּ֖י <S%H3653><s%> unto mine office וְאֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> תָלָֽה׃ <S%H8518><s%> and him he hanged

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> Then Pharaoh וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph וַיְרִיצֻ֖הוּ <S%H7323><s%> and they brought him hastily מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַבּ֑וֹר <S%H953><s%> out of the dungeon וַיְגַלַּח֙ <S%H1548><s%> and he shaved וַיְחַלֵּ֣ף <S%H2498><s%> [himself] and changed שִׂמְלֹתָ֔יו <S%H8071><s%> his raiment וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph חֲל֣וֹם <S%H2472><s%> a dream חָלַ֔מְתִּי <S%H2492><s%> I have dreamed וּפֹתֵ֖ר <S%H6622><s%> and [there is] none that can interpret אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I שָׁמַ֤עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> it and I have heard עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> about לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> say תִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> of thee [that] thou canst understand חֲל֖וֹם <S%H2472><s%> a dream לִפְתֹּ֥ר <S%H6622><s%> to interpret אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered יוֹסֵ֧ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּרְעֹ֛ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saying בִּלְעָדָ֑י <S%H1107><s%> [It is] not in me אֱלֹהִ֕ים <S%H430><s%> God יַעֲנֶ֖ה <S%H6030><s%> an answer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> of peace פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> said פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> unto Joseph בַּחֲלֹמִ֕י <S%H2472><s%> In my dream הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold עֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> behold I stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> upon the bank הַיְאֹֽר׃ <S%H2975><s%> of the river

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַיְאֹ֗ר <S%H2975><s%> out of the river עֹלֹת֙ <S%H5927><s%> And behold there came up שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פָּר֔וֹת <S%H6510><s%> kine בְּרִיא֥וֹת <S%H1277><s%> fat בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> body וִיפֹ֣ת <S%H3303><s%> and well תֹּ֑אַר <S%H8389><s%> favoured וַתִּרְעֶ֖ינָה <S%H7462><s%> and they fed בָּאָֽחוּ׃ <S%H260><s%> in a meadow

וְהִנֵּ֞ה <S%H2009><s%> Lo שֶֽׁבַע־ <S%H7651><s%> And behold seven פָּר֤וֹת <S%H6510><s%> kine אֲחֵרוֹת֙ <S%H312><s%> other עֹל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> came up אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H310><s%> after them דַּלּ֨וֹת <S%H1803><s%> poor וְרָע֥וֹת <S%H7451><s%> ill תֹּ֛אַר <S%H8389><s%> favoured מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> and very וְרַקּ֣וֹת <S%H7534><s%> thin בָּשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> I לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> as I never רָאִ֧יתִי <S%H7200><s%> saw כָהֵ֛נָּה <S%H2007><s%> such בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in all the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לָרֹֽעַ׃ <S%H7455><s%> for badness

וַתֹּאכַ֙לְנָה֙ <S%H398><s%> did eat up הַפָּר֔וֹת <S%H6510><s%> kine הָרַקּ֖וֹת <S%H7534><s%> And the lean וְהָרָע֑וֹת <S%H7451><s%> and the ill favoured אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֧בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven הַפָּר֛וֹת <S%H6510><s%> kine הָרִאשֹׁנ֖וֹת <S%H7223><s%> the first הַבְּרִיאֹֽת׃ <S%H1277><s%> fat

וַתָּבֹ֣אנָה <S%H935><s%> abide אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about קִרְבֶּ֗נָה <S%H7130><s%> among וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> could נוֹדַע֙ <S%H3045><s%> it could not be known כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> abide אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about קִרְבֶּ֔נָה <S%H7130><s%> among וּמַרְאֵיהֶ֣ן <S%H4758><s%> but they [were] still רַ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> ill favoured כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> as בַּתְּחִלָּ֑ה <S%H8462><s%> as at the beginning וָאִיקָֽץ׃ <S%H3364><s%> So I awoke

וָאֵ֖רֶא <S%H7200><s%> And I saw בַּחֲלֹמִ֑י <S%H2472><s%> in my dream וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> and behold שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> and behold seven שִׁבֳּלִ֗ים <S%H7641><s%> ears עֹלֹ֛ת <S%H5927><s%> came up בְּקָנֶ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> stalk אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> in one מְלֵאֹ֥ת <S%H4392><s%> full וְטֹבֽוֹת׃ <S%H2896><s%> and good

וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> and lo שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> And behold seven שִׁבֳּלִ֔ים <S%H7641><s%> ears צְנֻמ֥וֹת <S%H6798><s%> withered דַּקּ֖וֹת <S%H1851><s%> thin שְׁדֻפ֣וֹת <S%H7710><s%> [and] blasted קָדִ֑ים <S%H6921><s%> with the east wind צֹמְח֖וֹת <S%H6779><s%> sprung up אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> after them

וַתִּבְלַ֙עְןָ֙ <S%H1104><s%> devoured הָשִׁבֳּלִ֣ים <S%H7641><s%> ears הַדַּקֹּ֔ת <S%H1851><s%> And the thin אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> the seven הַֽשִׁבֳּלִ֖ים <S%H7641><s%> ears הַטֹּב֑וֹת <S%H2896><s%> good וָֽאֹמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> and I told אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַֽחַרְטֻמִּ֔ים <S%H2748><s%> [this] unto the magicians וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there מַגִּ֖יד <S%H5046><s%> but [there was] none that could declare לִֽי׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh חֲל֥וֹם <S%H2472><s%> The dream פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> [is] one ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> and הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> God עֹשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> what he [is] about to do הִגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> hath shewed לְפַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh
